column2: Starbucks policy shift is small win for gun safety
column3: big one for economic boycotts Starbucks' decision this week to ask customers to leave their guns at the door will please many of its loyal customers. Gun safety advocates are also claiming the move as a major victory and are promising to move on to other retailers that allow guns in their outlets. Nobody
column4: however
